Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

It looks like you might be asking about editing your profile on NewsBreak. You can find detailed instructions on how to edit your profile in the Help Center. Here's the link: [Profile and Info](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/sections/4417483968269-Profile-and-Info). Let me know if you need more help!
Your profile is pending verification. If verification isn't completed within 48 hours, please contact adsupport@newsbreak.com for help.

It seems like your profile is pending verification. If the verification process isn't completed within 48 hours, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance. They'll be able to help you with any issues related to your account verification.
What information should be sent for verification?

To proceed with the verification process, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number

Once this information is received, a thorough review will be conducted, and you'll be updated on your account status. Let me know if you have any other questions!
